Singapore on sale with Air New Zealand - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Singapore on sale with Air New Zealand Experience a stay in the “Lion City” of Singapore a one-of-a-kind country, featuring a world class food scene, green spaces that beautifully intertwine with the urban landscapes throughout the city & stay or visit Sentosa an Island resort connected to the city by cable car, monorail or road featuring Resort style hotels, beaches & golf courses. Deal Details Travel Dates 2 Mar 2026 - 30 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Nov 16, 2025 Priced From $2,409 Enquire Now Experience a stay in the “Lion City” of Singapore a one-of-a-kind country, featuring a world class food scene, green spaces that beautifully intertwine with the urban landscapes throughout the city & stay or visit Sentosa an Island resort connected to the city by cable car, monorail or road featuring Resort style hotels, beaches & golf courses. Accommodation Orchard Rendezvous Hotel (4 stars) Orchard Rendezvous Singapore is conveniently located at the beginning of Singapore’s most iconic shopping district, and minutes away from dining, nightlife and local attractions & entertainment. Guests can relax in the outdoor swimming pool, unwind in the lobby bar or stay active in the gym during their stay. Rooms Superior Room (3 nights) 09 Apr - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,409.00 Bonus: Guaranteed 3pm late check out, Complimentary Wifi and 1 x Complimentary admission ticket to Singapore Zoo Includes: Breakfast Daily Note: Blackout dates apply. 22-26 Apr 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Singapore from Auckland 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Oasia Hotel Novena Singapore (4 stars) Oasia Hotel Novena Singapore is a contemporary and stylish hotel located in the vibrant Novena district. Offering modern amenities, comfortable rooms, and exceptional service, it’s ideal for both business and leisure travelers. With a rooftop infinity pool, fitness center, and a variety of dining options, the hotel provides a relaxing oasis in the heart of the city. Its convenient location provides easy access to shopping, dining, and public transportation. Rooms Deluxe Room (3 nights) 02 Mar - 30 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,485.00 Includes: Breakfast Daily Note: Blackout dates apply. 20 Mar-08 Apr, 25-26 Apr, 18-22 Jun 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Singapore from Auckland 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Fairmont Singapore (5 stars) Experience a luxurious stay at Fairmont Singapore, perfectly located in the heart of the city and conveniently located above the City Hall and Esplanade MRT train stations. With each room or suite providing guests with a private sanctuary including luxury amenities and stunning views. Experience the onsite dining from seasonally inspired menus to The Eight, poolside restaurant located beside the landscaped pool area with two freeform outdoor pools on level 8. Rooms Deluxe Room with Balcony (3 nights) 08 Mar - 23 Jun 26 Stay price: $3,109.00 Note: Blackout Dates apply. 20 Mar-08 Apr 26. Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Singapore from Auckland 3 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Package pricing is per person, double share Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 30 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 03 November 2025 until 16 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Fare Basis: For travel: 02 Mar 26 - 30 Jun 26 - SSLA70 ('S' Class). General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares are based on 'The Works' economy class. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
